snippet: While spending rose 0.2 percent in August, the Commerce Department said, incomes actually fell for the first time in two years.
lead_paragraph: While spending rose 0.2 percent in August, the Commerce Department said, incomes actually fell for the first time in two years.

headline.main: U.S. Consumer Spending Rises, but Incomes Fall
headline.print_headline: U.S. Consumer Spending Rises, but Incomes Fall
